de.wwu.muggl.symbolic.generating.impl
Class OrderedArrayElementsGenerator

java.lang.Object
  de.wwu.muggl.symbolic.generating.impl.OrderedArrayElementsGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArrayElementsGenerator, GenericGenerator
public class OrderedArrayElementsGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArrayElementsGenerator

This ArrayElementsGenerator provides ordered array elements.

Exampled: If four elements are requested the following elements are provided:

  • a
  • a + 1
  • a + 2
  • a + 3

Version:
1.0.0, 2010-03-10
Author:
Tim Majchrzak

Constructor Detail

OrderedArrayElementsGenerator

public OrderedArrayElementsGenerator(de.wwu.testtool.expressions.NumericVariable baseVariable,
                                     boolean descending)
Construct the array elements generator by specifying the order.

Parameters:
baseVariable - The base variable for all elements provided.
descending - If set to true, elements will be provided in descending order, otherwise the order will be ascending.
Method Detail

hasAnotherElement

public boolean hasAnotherElement()
Check if this generator can provide another element.

Specified by:
hasAnotherElement in interface ArrayElementsGenerator
Returns:
true, if less than Integer.MAX_VALUE elements have been provided.

provideElement

public de.wwu.testtool.expressions.Term provideElement(int index)
Provide a generated element of type Term.

Specified by:
provideElement in interface ArrayElementsGenerator
Parameters:
index - The index the element requested will take in the array. Will be ignored.
Returns:
A generated element of type Term.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If no more elements are available. This cannot happen if checking the availability with hasAnotherElement() first and not having more than one thread access this generator.

reset

public void reset()
Reset the internal element count. The next element provided will be an unbound variable.

Specified by:
reset in interface ArrayElementsGenerator

Get the name of the ArrayElementsGenerator.

Returns:
